short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Capture your screen or webcam, effortlessly share your video, and track viewer engagement with OneDay!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
OneDayâ€™s email extension is a powerful tool that makes it incredibly easy for you to record, share, and track videos straight from your inbox. 

With the screen recording feature, you can record yourself, your screen, or both, and send the video with just a few clicks.
 
Both features are perfect for anyone looking to add a personal touch to their email communications and increase engagement and conversions.

Key Features:
- Record - Quickly capture your screen, webcam, or both with ease.
- Customize - Enhance your recording by adding a personalized call-to-action.
- Share - Directly embed your video in your email for seamless sharing.
- Analyze - Monitor recipient engagement with your content in real-time.

By using the OneDay Email Extension and Screen Recorder, you can stand out in a crowded inbox, increase engagement and conversions, and build stronger relationships with your prospects and clients.

About OneDay
OneDay helps businesses improve their sales, marketing, internal, and external communication strategies by enabling users to create high-quality personalized videos that increase engagement, conversions, and sales.
